definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="0" y="0"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="return_string"><value name="return"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">You can use this to store your hard earned rupees, although it's only big enough to hold 99!         </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="3"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text_new_line"></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text_format_number"><value name="number"><block type="item_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">RupeeCount</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><value name="format"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">##.##</field></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/99</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
